TopicTitle: How about mod that could add enviromental sounds?

Articles.Content:
Psychology of people depends on sounds very much for example short and silent sounds can cause people to fear or heavy and repeating ones exite people

I would really like a mod that adds special sounds to different kinds of environment. Like heavy wind that make noise in eve or jool atmosphere. Or the sound of dust storms on duna. Water sounds on laythe.  And inside crew cabin noises like beeps and chatterer on non-atmospheric worlds.  Birds singing on kerbin and stuff like that wil make game feel like reality.
I agree. A few simple sounds could really improve the game. Not sure why you're posting this in Development Suggestions though. Stock game could use it too.

You're welcome.

Edited February 12, 2017 by Rocket In My Pocket
